menu.name: Smoked Nyama Choma Platter
menu.description: Chargrilled beef cuts marinated in house spices, served with herb flatbread and fire-roasted pepper sauce.

menu.name: Truffle Ugali Bites with Sukuma Aioli
menu.description: Crispy ugali cubes infused with truffle oil, paired with creamy sukuma wiki aioli dip.

menu.name: Zanzibar Coconut Tilapia
menu.description: Pan-seared lake tilapia in a rich coconut curry sauce, served with a side of coconut rice and fried plantains.

menu.name: Pilau Risotto with Cardamom Lamb
menu.description: A Swahili-inspired twist on risotto, slow-cooked with fragrant pilau spices and topped with tender lamb.

menu.name: Charred Chapati Tacos (Ndengu + Kachumbari)
menu.description: Folded mini chapatis filled with spiced green grams and fresh kachumbari salsa — street food meets gourmet.

menu.name: Githeri Buddha Bowl
menu.description: A nourishing bowl of classic githeri, roasted veggies, avocado slices, and a tangy lemon dressing.

menu.name: Mango Chili Kuku Skewers
menu.description: Grilled kienyeji chicken glazed with mango chili sauce, served on skewers with roasted corn mash.

menu.name: Matoke Mash with Creamy Spinach
menu.description: Silky mashed matoke served with sautéed spinach in garlic cream sauce and toasted sesame seeds.

menu.name: Samosa Trio with Tamarind Dip
menu.description: A gourmet sampler of beef, chicken, and veggie samosas served with a house-made tamarind chutney.

menu.name: Rosemary Infused Mandazi Stack
menu.description: Fluffy mandazi rounds with a hint of rosemary and cardamom, lightly dusted with cinnamon sugar.

order: Truffle Ugali Bites with Sukuma Aioli
